_header: When Jesu Christ our lord almighty
_description: Gospel for the Twenty-first Sunday after Trinity, in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BLHar4196.First Lines: When ihesus crist oure lord almightyHad soiorned lang in samary…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …God len vs so to vse þir seuynÞat we may win þe blis of heuyn
BLHar4196.Editions:
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols.
